channel.title: Make an NPC Attack with mage/range?
channel.description:
I am just asking how do I make an NPC attack with mage/range and hit HIGH, Like as a boss/jad.
I am sorta a newbie at this xd. So pleaseee dont yell at me.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2009, 02:34:06 am[/size][hr]I also would like him to attack with Melee/range/mage or melee/mage or melee/range.
Just so its difficult for people to noclip the monster away and find a safe spot[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2009, 03:01:48 am[/size][hr]Can someone help please :)?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2009, 09:58:51 pm[/size][hr]or not? :s
